titleStmt.title: The Christian subject: a treatise directing a Christian to a peaceable conversation sutable to an holy calling. Wherein are answered those ordinary objections, of haresy, tyranny, usurpation, breaeh [sic] of covenant. Which some make as a sufficient plea to take them off from a chearfull obedience to this present government. / Written by Iohn Rocket, Minister of the Gospell at Hickling in Nottinghamshire.
titleStmt.author: Rocket, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Bishop for william Gilbertson, at the sign of the Bible without Newgate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the sign of the Bible without Newgate
